== What is Ubuntu ==
Ubuntu is a GNU/Linux distribution best defined as "an operating system for human beings." It adheres to a strict <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/ubuntustory/philosophy|philosophy]]</nowiki> of freedom and accessibility. Learn more at http://www.ubuntu.com/ . If you want to install Ubuntu, visit <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/products/GetUbuntu|here]]</nowiki> to start.  You might also be interested in our <nowiki>[[SouthDakotaTeam-KB-GuidedInstall|guided installation service]]</nowiki>.
